name: Summer Berry Chocolate Mousse
description: The perfect anytime dessert! And the kids can help!
preparation:
1. In a large bowl, whisk Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix with milk (according to pkg directions). Refrigerate until set.
  2. Using an electric beater, beat whipping cream with Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix and sour cream until stiff peaks form.
  3. Spoon 1⁄4 whipped cream into pudding and stir to mix.
  4. Add remaining whipped cream and berries. Gently fold until mixed.
  5. Spoon into small bowls, jars, or cups. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Garnish with extra berries and mint, if you wish.
